com21HcxOc3.name: com21HcxOc3
com21HcxOc3.contactinfo: Network Management Postal: Paul Gordon Com21, Inc. 750 Tasman Drive Milpitas, California 95035 USA Tel: +1 408 953 9100 Fax: +1 408 953 9299 E-mail: pgordon@com21.com
com21HcxOc3.description: This is the Com21 ComController Oc3 MIB module. COM21 Part# 005-0025-00

hcxOc3HardwareVersion.name: hcxOc3HardwareVersion
hcxOc3HardwareVersion.description: contains the hardware version of the Oc3 card. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxOc3BootVersion.name: hcxOc3BootVersion
hcxOc3BootVersion.description: contains the version of the Oc3 card boot ROM. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxOc3UnitPrimServState.name: hcxOc3UnitPrimServState
hcxOc3UnitPrimServState.description: contains primary service state of the Oc3 Unit.

hcxOc3UnitPrimStateChange.name: hcxOc3UnitPrimStateChange
hcxOc3UnitPrimStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxOc3UnitPrimServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3UnitSecServState.name: hcxOc3UnitSecServState
hcxOc3UnitSecServState.description: contains a string defining the secondary service states of the Oc3 Unit. The substrings supported by the Oc3 Unit shall be: UNEQ - unequipped.

hcxOc3UnitSecStateChange.name: hcxOc3UnitSecStateChange
hcxOc3UnitSecStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxOc3UnitSecServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3RestartAction.name: hcxOc3RestartAction
hcxOc3RestartAction.description: The Oc3 Unit Restart Action is an active-value. The setting of this attribute to restart(2) causes the Oc3 card to reset and download a new image.

hcxOc3TestStatusLed.name: hcxOc3TestStatusLed
hcxOc3TestStatusLed.description: The Oc3 Test Status LED is a read-only attribute which describes the condition of the Oc3 Test Status light emitting diode located on the Oc3 board. A value of on(1) indicates that a service effecting test is in progress and that the LED is illuminated. Will be off if no card present.

hcxOc3TestStatusLedChange.name: hcxOc3TestStatusLedChange
hcxOc3TestStatusLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in test LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3FaultStatusLed.name: hcxOc3FaultStatusLed
hcxOc3FaultStatusLed.description: The Oc3 Fault Status LED is a read-only attribute which describes the condition of the Oc3 Fault Status light emitting diode located on the Oc3 board. A value of on(1) indicates that an fault condition has been detected (for which a trap will have been issued) and the LED is illuminated. Will be off if no card present.

hcxOc3FaultStatusLedChange.name: hcxOc3FaultStatusLedChange
hcxOc3FaultStatusLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in the Fault LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3SerialNumber.name: hcxOc3SerialNumber
hcxOc3SerialNumber.description: contains the serial number of the Oc3 card. Will contain empty string if card has not been inserted in the slot.

hcxOc3SyncClkConfigure.name: hcxOc3SyncClkConfigure
hcxOc3SyncClkConfigure.description: This attribute allows to configure the Oc3 card as the primary or secondary source for network clock. This attribute is valid only if networkClk is selected in hcxSyncClkConfigure attribute. Only 1 Oc3 Card can be configured as the priSrc and 1 Oc3 Card can be configured as secSrc in the HCX system Default: disable

hcxOc3PortShelfId.name: hcxOc3PortShelfId
hcxOc3PortShelfId.description: contains shelf in which this Oc3 port is located.

hcxOc3PortSlotId.name: hcxOc3PortSlotId
hcxOc3PortSlotId.description: contains slot in which this Oc3 port is located.

hcxOc3PortPrimServState.name: hcxOc3PortPrimServState
hcxOc3PortPrimServState.description: contains primary service state of the Oc3 Unit. This state shall be effected by the hcxOc3PortState attribute.

hcxOc3PortPrimStateChange.name: hcxOc3PortPrimStateChange
hcxOc3PortPrimStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxOc3PortPrimServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3PortSecServState.name: hcxOc3PortSecServState
hcxOc3PortSecServState.description: contains a string defining the secondary service states of the Oc3 Unit. The substrings supported by the Oc3 Unit shall be: MT - offline, set by hcxOc3, FAULT - hardware failure, TEST - test, UNEQ - unequipped.

hcxOc3PortSecStateChange.name: hcxOc3PortSecStateChange
hcxOc3PortSecStateChange.description: This trap is generated whenever a change in the the hcxOc3PortSecServState occurs. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3MaxBandwidth.name: hcxOc3MaxBandwidth
hcxOc3MaxBandwidth.description: This attribute defines the maximum output payload bandwidth associated with the Oc3 port. Defined in thousands of bps. From 0 to 22222. This value shall be checked by the CC which shall ensure that the aggregate of the hcxOc3MaxBandwidth and hcxEtherMaxBandwidth attributes for each of the Oc3 and Ethernet ports does not exceed the system maximum. If Voice Channels are configured on this Port, and if Voice channels are active, Ondemand Data bandwidth will get squeezed if Voice Channels are active. Default: 7000

hcxOc3AggrDnStrmCbrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrDnStrmCbrRate
hcxOc3AggrDnStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream CBR rates configured on the Oc3 port This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrDnStrmPcrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrDnStrmPcrRate
hcxOc3AggrDnStrmPcrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream PCR rates configured on the Oc3 port This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrUpStrmCbrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrUpStrmCbrRate
hcxOc3AggrUpStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream CBR rates configured on the Oc3 port This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMinRate.name: hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMinRate
hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMinRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream minimum PCR rates on the Oc3 port This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMaxRate.name: hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMaxRate
hcxOc3AggrUpStrmMaxRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream maximum cell rates on the Oc3 port This includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AgeTime.name: hcxOc3AgeTime
hcxOc3AgeTime.description: This attribute defines, in seconds, the aging time for non-accessed entries in the Bridge mapping table. The default shall be 300secs. If this set to 0, then aging is disabled.

hcxOc3PortConfigState.name: hcxOc3PortConfigState
hcxOc3PortConfigState.description: The Oc3 Port State is an active-value. The Oc3 port will default to offline, in which case no traffic shall be passed. Default offline.

hcxOc3PortRestartAction.name: hcxOc3PortRestartAction
hcxOc3PortRestartAction.description: The Oc3 Port Restart Action is an active-value. The setting of this attribute to restart(2) causes the Oc3 port to reset and download a new image.

hcxOc3PortDiagTestAction.name: hcxOc3PortDiagTestAction
hcxOc3PortDiagTestAction.description: This attribute is used to invoke the internal Oc3 card diagnostic test. In order to activate this test, the card must be placed in the test state.

hcxOc3PortDiagTestComplete.name: hcxOc3PortDiagTestComplete
hcxOc3PortDiagTestComplete.description: This notification is generated whenever the Oc3 port internal diagnostic tests are completed. Event only, no clear. Only severity allowed is WARNING.

hcxOc3PortDiagTestResult.name: hcxOc3PortDiagTestResult
hcxOc3PortDiagTestResult.description: This attribute contains the result of the last Oc3 port diagnostic test.

hcxOc3OperationFailure.name: hcxOc3OperationFailure
hcxOc3OperationFailure.description: This notification is generated by the CC whenever an Oc3 port fails to respond correctly to a request. This failure could indicate either a resource problem or software failure. Note that if an Oc3 card failures to respond completely to a CC request, then a hcxInsertChange trap shall be generated. This is an event without a corresponding clear. Only severity allowed is WARNING.

hcxOc3PortLOSLed.name: hcxOc3PortLOSLed
hcxOc3PortLOSLed.description: The OC3 Loss Of Signal LED indicates whether a Loss of Signal is present on the WAN side of the OC3 port.

hcxOc3PortLOSLedChange.name: hcxOc3PortLOSLedChange
hcxOc3PortLOSLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in the LOS LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmCbrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmCbrRate
hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream CBR rates active on the Oc3 port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmPcrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmPcrRate
hcxOc3AggrActDnStrmPcrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort downstream PCR rates active on the Oc3 port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmCbrRate.name: hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmCbrRate
hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmCbrRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream CBR rates active on the Oc3 port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in bits per second.

hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMinRate.name: hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMinRate
hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMinRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream minimum PCR rates active on the Oc3 port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMaxRate.name: hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMaxRate
hcxOc3AggrActUpStrmMaxRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate of all ComPort upstream maximum cell rates active on the Oc3 port (VLAN). This includes only acquired ComPorts. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3PortIpAddr.name: hcxOc3PortIpAddr
hcxOc3PortIpAddr.description: IP Address associated with this ethernet port. This is a future item for telephone return support.

hcxOc3PortIpMask.name: hcxOc3PortIpMask
hcxOc3PortIpMask.description: IP mask associated with port. Default is ff.ff.ff.ff. This is a future item for telephone return support.

hcxOc3Port1483EncapEnbl.name: hcxOc3Port1483EncapEnbl
hcxOc3Port1483EncapEnbl.description: This attribute is used to Enable/Disable 1483 Encapsulation on the Oc3Port. If enabled, then all Ethernet packets received by the Oc3Port should be 1483 Encapsulated and all Ethernet packets transmitted by the Oc3Port will be 1483 Encapsulated. Default: enable.

hcxOc3PortSectionLOS.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOS
hcxOc3PortSectionLOS.description: This attribute indicates whether Section Loss of Signal is present at the OC3 Port. Default: off.

hcxOc3PortSectionLOSDetected.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOSDetected
hcxOc3PortSectionLOSDetected.description: generated whenever Loss of Signal is detected at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: MAJOR

hcxOc3PortSectionLOSClear.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOSClear
hcxOc3PortSectionLOSClear.description: generated whenever Loss of Signal is Cleared at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: CLEAR

hcxOc3PortSectionLOF.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOF
hcxOc3PortSectionLOF.description: This attribute indicates whether Section Loss of Frame is present at the OC3 Port. Default: off.

hcxOc3PortSectionLOFDetected.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOFDetected
hcxOc3PortSectionLOFDetected.description: generated whenever Loss of Frame is detected at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: MAJOR

hcxOc3PortSectionLOFClear.name: hcxOc3PortSectionLOFClear
hcxOc3PortSectionLOFClear.description: generated whenever Loss of Frame is cleared at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: CLEAR

hcxOc3PortLineAIS.name: hcxOc3PortLineAIS
hcxOc3PortLineAIS.description: This attribute indicates whether Line Alarm Indication Signal is detected by the OC3 Port Default: off.

hcxOc3PortLineAISDetected.name: hcxOc3PortLineAISDetected
hcxOc3PortLineAISDetected.description: generated whenever AIS is detected at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: MAJOR

hcxOc3PortLineAISClear.name: hcxOc3PortLineAISClear
hcxOc3PortLineAISClear.description: generated whenever AIS is cleared at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: CLEAR

hcxOc3PortLineRDI.name: hcxOc3PortLineRDI
hcxOc3PortLineRDI.description: This attribute indicates whether Line Remote Defect Indication is detected by the OC3 Port Default: off.

hcxOc3PortLineRDIDetected.name: hcxOc3PortLineRDIDetected
hcxOc3PortLineRDIDetected.description: generated whenever Line Remote Defect Indication is detected at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: MAJOR

hcxOc3PortLineRDIClear.name: hcxOc3PortLineRDIClear
hcxOc3PortLineRDIClear.description: generated whenever Line Remote Defect Indication is cleared at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: CLEAR

hcxOc3PortPathRDI.name: hcxOc3PortPathRDI
hcxOc3PortPathRDI.description: This attribute indicates whether Path Remote Defect Indication is detected by the OC3 Port Default: off.

hcxOc3PortPathRDIDetected.name: hcxOc3PortPathRDIDetected
hcxOc3PortPathRDIDetected.description: generated whenever Path Remote Defect Indication is detected at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: MAJOR

hcxOc3PortPathRDIClear.name: hcxOc3PortPathRDIClear
hcxOc3PortPathRDIClear.description: generated whenever Path Remote Defect Indication is cleared at the OC3 Port. Alarm Severity: CLEAR

hcxOc3PortAggrVoiceRate.name: hcxOc3PortAggrVoiceRate
hcxOc3PortAggrVoiceRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate Rate of all Voice Channels configured on this Port. A voice channel is considered configured on this Port if: a ComPort is configured with Voice Channel and the ComPort is configured on a Vlan which is on this Port. The rate specified here includes both acquired and unacquired ComPorts and is the same in both Upstream and Downstream Direction. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3PortAggrActVoiceRate.name: hcxOc3PortAggrActVoiceRate
hcxOc3PortAggrActVoiceRate.description: This attribute specifies the aggregate Rate of all Voice Channels Active on this Port. A voice channel is considered Active on this Port if: a ComPort is configured with Voice Channel and the ComPort is configured on a Vlan which is on this Port and the Comport is acquired and the Comport has a Voice Channel Active. The rate specified here is the same in both Upstream and Downstream Direction. Defined in Kbps.

hcxOc3PortLOFLed.name: hcxOc3PortLOFLed
hcxOc3PortLOFLed.description: The OC3 Loss Of Frame LED indicates whether a Loss of Frame is present on the WAN side of the OC3 port.

hcxOc3PortLOFLedChange.name: hcxOc3PortLOFLedChange
hcxOc3PortLOFLedChange.description: generated whenever there is a change in the LOF LED status. This an event with no clear condition. Only severity is WARNING.

hcxOc3VccShelfId.name: hcxOc3VccShelfId
hcxOc3VccShelfId.description: Specifies the Shelf where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3VccSlotId.name: hcxOc3VccSlotId
hcxOc3VccSlotId.description: Specifies the Slot where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3VccPortId.name: hcxOc3VccPortId
hcxOc3VccPortId.description: Specifies the Port where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3VccVpi.name: hcxOc3VccVpi
hcxOc3VccVpi.description: Specifies the Vpi where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3VccVci.name: hcxOc3VccVci
hcxOc3VccVci.description: Specifies the Vci where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3VccType.name: hcxOc3VccType
hcxOc3VccType.description: Specifies whether this VCC is used to transport data or voice.

hcxOc3StatsShelfId.name: hcxOc3StatsShelfId
hcxOc3StatsShelfId.description: Specifies the Shelf where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3StatsSlotId.name: hcxOc3StatsSlotId
hcxOc3StatsSlotId.description: Specifies the Slot where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3StatsPortId.name: hcxOc3StatsPortId
hcxOc3StatsPortId.description: Specifies the Port where this Entry exists.

hcxOc3StatsCurrSectionBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsCurrSectionBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsCurrSectionBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Section Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsCurrLineBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsCurrLineBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsCurrLineBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Line Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsCurrPathBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsCurrPathBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsCurrPathBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Path Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsCurrLineFEndBlockErr.name: hcxOc3StatsCurrLineFEndBlockErr
hcxOc3StatsCurrLineFEndBlockErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Far End Line Block Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsCurrPathFEndBlockErr.name: hcxOc3StatsCurrPathFEndBlockErr
hcxOc3StatsCurrPathFEndBlockErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Far End Path Block Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsPrevSectionBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsPrevSectionBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsPrevSectionBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Section Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsPrevLineBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsPrevLineBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsPrevLineBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Line Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsPrevPathBIPErr.name: hcxOc3StatsPrevPathBIPErr
hcxOc3StatsPrevPathBIPErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Path Byte Interleaved Parity Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsPrevLineFEndBlockErr.name: hcxOc3StatsPrevLineFEndBlockErr
hcxOc3StatsPrevLineFEndBlockErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Far End Line Block Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsPrevPathFEndBlockErr.name: hcxOc3StatsPrevPathFEndBlockErr
hcxOc3StatsPrevPathFEndBlockErr.description: This attributes displays the number of Far End Path Block Errors reported by the OC3 Port in the current 15-minute period.

hcxOc3StatsClear.name: hcxOc3StatsClear
hcxOc3StatsClear.description: This attribute is used to clear the all OC3 Stats statistics counters in this group. This operation is only possible if the hcxStatsControl attribute is set to wrapCurr.
